contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=September 2009}} {{Coord|53.407|-2.542|display=title|region:GB_scale:5000}} The '''Grange Industrial Estate''' is an area of warehousing and employment in [[Warrington]], [[England]]. The largest of these was the [[Safeway (UK)|Safeway]] warehouse until it was taken over by [[Morrisons]] in January 2006 and the large bank vault of the former [[Midland Bank]]. The Estate borders the [[civil parishes in England|civil parish]] of [[Woolston, Cheshire|Woolston]]. The estate was created in its present location in proximity to the [[M6 motorway|M6]], [[M62 motorway|M62]] and [[M56 motorway]] networks. It also borders [[Woolston Park]] and is close to the suburbs of [[Longbarn]] and [[Birchwood]]. [[Category:Buildings and structures in Warrington]] [[Category:Industrial parks in the United Kingdom]] [[Category:Business parks of England]] {{England-org-stub}}
